resources.string:
Welcome to Herolte Vibrations
This App was put together to show that Vibration settings are in fact available in LineageOS herolte, even though the setting cannot be reached through the settings menu.
Set the slider and push the button!

Root is required for this app to work.
The setting resets to default after reboot.
Source Code at https://github.com/plan5/HerolteVibrations
